univie.cs.psps.utils
Class GraphWriter

java.lang.Object
  peersim.reports.GraphObserver
      univie.cs.psps.utils.GraphWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Control
public class GraphWriter
extends GraphObserver

A subclass of GraphObserver to save the network graph to a .dot file, intended for plotting with Graphviz.

This control expects the following parameters in the configuration file:

filename - the name of the .dot file written by this class.

Author:
Dario Seidl
